#summary Ontology Design Pattern: Scientific Investigation
#sidebar SIOSideBar
=Investigation=
An investigation (SIO_000747) aims to uncover facts about an object of study. A scientific investigation, or experiment, aims to provide facts to support or dispute a well formulated hypothesis.  Investigations _typically_ involves:

 * the formulation of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000284 hypothesis]
 * the development and/or adoption of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001041 study design]
 * the preparation of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_010412 specimen(s)]
 * the execution of an [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001007 assay]
 * the tabulation and analysis of [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000069 data]
 * the [http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_000020 interpretation] of the results
 * the preparation of an investigational [[http://semanticscience.org/resource/SIO_001026 report]
